content: round 2 2 single_crochet in every st 12 round 3 1 single_crochet in every st 12 round 4 1 single_crochet in every st 12 sage round 5 2 half_double_crochet in every st 24 round 6 1 single_crochet in every st 24 round 7 *2 half_double_crochet puff + chain 1 repeat from * to the end 24 half_double_crochet 12 puff + chain 1 36 curry see the special note above round 8 1 single_crochet in every st 36 round 9 1 scblo in every st 36 glowing round 10 2 scblo in every st 72 email for pattern support danaswanderlustcrochet@gmail com 4 puffy wasp nest by dana bernhardt round 11 1 single_crochet in every st 72 burnt sienna round 12 *half_double_crochet skip 1 repeat from * to the end 36 half_double_crochet round 13 *half_double_crochet puff + chain 1 repeat from * to the end 18 half_double_crochet 18 puff + chain 1 36 taupe see the special note above round 14 1 single_crochet in every st 36 round 15 1 scblo in every st 36 sage round 16 1 scblo in every st 36 round 17 1 single_crochet in every st 36 curry round 18 1 half_double_crochet in every st 36 email for pattern support danaswanderlustcrochet@gmail com 5 puffy wasp nest by dana bernhardt round 19 *half_double_crochet puff + chain 1 repeat from * to the end 18 half_double_crochet 18 puff + chain 1 36 glowing see the special note above round 20 1 single_crochet in every st 36 round 21 1 scblo in every st 36 burnt sienna round 22 1 scblo in every st 36 round 23 1 single_crochet in every st 36 taupe round 24 *half_double_crochet half_double_crochet hdc2tog repeat from * to the end 18 half_double_crochet 9 hdc2tog 27 email for pattern support danaswanderlustcrochet@gmail com 6 puffy wasp nest by dana bernhardt sage round 25 *single_crochet puff + chain 1 repeat from * skipping the last st 13 single_crochet 13 puff + chain 1 26 round 26 1 single_crochet in every st curry round 27 *half_double_crochet hdc2tog repeat from * skipping the last st 8 half_double_crochet 8 hdc2tog 16 fill with poly-fil taupe round 28 decrease to the end 8 round 29 1 single_crochet in every st slip_stitch to the first st 8 finish off leaving a long tail sew the tail in and out of the last round of stitches and pull tight to close off weave in the tail and cut the excess loop join yarn to the top of any stitch somewhere close to round 28 chain 12 and slip_stitch to the top of the same round on the opposite side fasten_off weave in ends copyright ©2023 dana bernhardt all rights reserved this pattern may be printed for your personal use only do not reproduce sell or copy this pattern in any
